text: Motion
...Ah, Producer──!

Oh, it's you, Hana.
...Where's Haruki?

Haruki-chan is still getting ready to leave,
so I was thinking I should buy something to drink.

I see,
I'll buy you something then. What would you like?

Ahah, yayー
That tea would be great.
Here's your tea.
Motion
Thank you.
Motion
Motion

......
Hey, Producer

I was wondering, what does Luca-chan think
about Haruki and I.
Motion
ーEh.

It's been a little while since we began working together
as CoMETIK butー
We haven't really gotten to know her very well.
Like today, she took a taxi home by herself already.

...Maybe
she wasn't happy about something.

ー...
I don't think she was unhappy about anything.

I think it's just... that this has been a significant change
in environment for Luca too...

...I'm sure
she just needs a little more time...

ーAt least
that's the way I see things...

──── I see.
So this is hard for Luca-chan as well.
